skillTree.localised_description: These steeds of twisted flesh and bone heed their masters commands as they carry them into the fray

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The shattered remains of the once noble Dragon killed by his sire so many many years ago given new and terrible purpose

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, its easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponents guard.

skillTree.localised_name: Woe To All But The Worthy!
skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions regret their rash pride after the valiant challenge they issued is accepted by a creature whose eyes are the eyes of death itself.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: A true knight will never abandon his armour; sometimes the steel skin appears to be part of his body.
If they wont move, make them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death

skillTree.localised_name: Summon Warriors of Old: Knights of Blood Keep
skillTree.localised_description: Let your blade be your only truth, let death be your only answer, and let your quest be for naught but to become more than what you are.

effects.description: Ability: "Summon Warriors of Old: Knights of Blood Keep"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Summon Warriors of Old: Knights of Blood Keep

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
The body of a Vampire looks human, but is capable of reactions so fast that even the quickest swordsman would look clumsy in comparison.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
A Vampire's eyes are like deep pits within which mortals find their doom; the unfortunate victims can do nothing but stare, entranced by the deadly hunter preparing to strike.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.localised_name: Champions Of The Path: Ordo Draconis
skillTree.localised_description: Considering themselves above all others in skill and martial prowess, the Ordo Draconis holds claim to being the first and longest standing Ordo of Abhorash's disparte children.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.
A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

factionEffects.localised_description: After a long absence, Walach Harkon is in the process of rebuilding the Ordo Draconis and reuniting with his old master.
factionEffects.localised_title: Grand Master of the Ordo Draconis

effects.description:
Unit capacity: -97
	Bloodkin Thrall Adept Knights
Search out hidden Order Libraries, challenge Worthy Foes and construct Blood Keeps all over the world to lead the Blood Knights into battle!
Unit Upgrades: Units need to gain experience to climb up the ranks of the Order and upgrade into more powerful units.
Access to "Hidden Blood Knight Outpost stance" which is an upgraded version of the Encampment stance
Raiding stance generates 2 Precious Metal per turn

items.colour_text: Shortly after claiming Blood Keep, Walach Harkon found the chalice and filled it with the blood of his most respected opponents, including the former Master of the Order. Over the years, he added splashes of blood from other knights, holy men, and Witch Hunters.

item_set.description: Walach's own blade and recovered chalice breath new life, and legitmacy, into the Ordo Draconis claim of superiority.

effects.description: Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after winning a battle

items.colour_text: The very sword Walach used to cut down the true Grand Master of the Order of the Blood Dragon. It's keen edge means red ruin to any who dare oppose him.
